title: Amy Schumer
description:
We're celebrating the Oscars with upcoming co-host Amy Schumer, one of our favorite Comedy Gold Minds interviews. Kevin and Amy discuss how motherhood has changed her comedy, accidentally naming her son ‘genital’ for a month, and how your sex life changes once you are a parent.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (kevin hart, amy schumer)
